content: Hello Thilina! I'm delighted to meet you and help with any questions or topics related to cancer research and statistics. Please feel free to share the specific aspects of cancer you're interested in, and I'll do my best to summarize the relevant information from the provided PDF document. What would you like to explore today?

You've shared your name with me, Thilina. Now, would you like to dive into the world of cancer and explore topics such as cancer types, global statistics, or perhaps the latest advancements in cancer treatment and research?
thanks. how many deaths expect in US related to Brest cancer

According to the provided PDF document, it is estimated that in the US (specifically, for the year 2025), there will be approximately **42,680** deaths related to breast cancer. This information can be found in the section titled "Estimated Most Common Cancers (US Projections for 2025)" under the subheading "Cancer Type Estimated New Cases (2025) Estimated Deaths (2025)".

Unfortunately, the provided PDF document does not contain specific statistics for Sri Lanka. The document primarily focuses on global estimates and US-based projections. It does mention global estimates for cancer deaths and new cases, but it does not provide separate statistics for Sri Lanka.

However, if you're interested in knowing the global estimates for breast cancer deaths, the document mentions that around **9.7 million** people died from cancer globally in 2022, with approximately **20 million** new cancer cases diagnosed worldwide in the same year.
